glossary.item: Making notes directly onto a text such as a book, a handout, or another type of publication.
An objective summary includes only factual information from the original source and does not include the emotional or biased opinions.
Meanings determined by the reader which may not be explicitly stated in the text.
A translation or interpretation.
The dictionary definition of a word; the literal, precise or exact meaning of a word.
symbols of Chinese language
phonetic notation for Chinese characters
Words in different languages that share the same root or origin.
A word that was borrowed from another language
a fixed format for a certain type of sentence in Chinese
phonetic annotation tool for Chinese characters
components that compose of pinyin
unique pitch how Chinese characters are pronounced
A contemporary Chinese pop singer from Taiwan
numbers that consists of two digits such as 34 and 85
words that are used to start a question, such as “what” and “when”
words that modify a noun or pronoun to indicate possession
a term describing how people use mobile technologies in their everyday lives
buying and selling products or services through wireless hand-held devices such as mobile phones
a group of people sharing common interests, ideas, and feelings over the Internet
the roof of the mouth
A contemporary Chinese pop singer from Taiwan
diet commonly practiced in China
diet commonly practiced in America
Loose Leaf tea that originates from China
desserts that are common in diets in China
